mfaSetup.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
mfaSetup.step1Description: Open your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password, etc.) and scan this QR code:
mfaSetup.orManualEntry: Or enter this secret key manually:
mfaSetup.step2Description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app:
mfaSetup.backupCodesDescription: Store these codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator:
mfaSetup.success: ‚úÖ Two-Factor Authentication enabled successfully! Your account is now protected.

passwordChange.title: üîê Change Password

passwordChange.expiryNote: Your password expires every 90 days. Choose a strong password you haven't used before.

trustedDevicesInfo.title: üì± Trusted Devices
